column1: '''''Modern Fantasy: Five Studies''''' is a 1975 study of works of fantasy, including essays on authors such as [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[C.S. Lewis]], [[George MacDonald]], and [[Wikipedia:Mervyn Peake
column2: Mervyn Peake]]. The author quotes from [[Letter to C.N. Manlove
column3: a letter]] from Tolkien discussing ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (p. 158).<ref name=TB>{{webcite
